word_mean: 老视：由于年老视力减退和远视
由于水晶体失去弹力，调节力减小，因而明视距离的近点被拉得更远

means.word_mean: 1. farsightedness resulting from a reduced ability to focus caused by loss of elasticity of the crystalline lens with age
